login.TERMS_CONTENT:
Terms and Conditions

1. Acceptance of Terms

By using this service, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

2. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify the terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting.

3. Privacy

Your privacy is important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for details on how we collect and use your personal information.

4. Permitted Use

You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.

5. User Account

You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.

6. User-Generated Content

You are solely responsible for the content you upload, publish, or transmit through the service.

7. Limitation of Liability

We shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of the use or inability to use the service.

8. Governing Law

These terms will be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the country where our company is registered.

9. Contact Us

For any questions regarding these Terms and Conditions, contact us at: brokersphere1@gmail.com.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.INTRODUCTION_CONTENT: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our site.
PRIVACY_POLICY.INFORMATION_COLLECTED_CONTENT: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.
PRIVACY_POLICY.INFORMATION_USAGE_CONTENT: We use the collected information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to protect our users.
PRIVACY_POLICY.INFORMATION_SHARING_CONTENT: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except where required by law or necessary to provide our services.
PRIVACY_POLICY.INFORMATION_SECURITY_CONTENT: We adopt reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
PRIVACY_POLICY.YOUR_RIGHTS_CONTENT: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can exercise these rights by contacting us at the provided email address.
PRIVACY_POLICY.POLICY_CHANGES_CONTENT: We reserve the right to change this privacy policy at any time. Changes will be posted on this page. Continued use of the site after the changes are posted implies acceptance of the changes.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_CONTENT: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, you can contact us at the

TERMS_OF_SERVICE.TITLE: Terms of Service
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.ACCEPTANCE_CONTENT: By using our website, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our site.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.CHANGES_CONTENT: We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page. Continued use of the site after the changes are posted implies acceptance of the changes.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.SERVICES_CONTENT: Our site offers an interactive dashboard that replicates stock market trends, allowing users to analyze historical data and current stock exchange trends. Key features include:

DATA_VISUALIZATION_DETAILS: Interactive charts for monitoring stock prices.
Integration with financial APIs to acquire real-time updated data.
SERVICES_LIST.FAVORITES_MANAGEMENT_DETAILS: A function that allows users to select and save favorite stocks for quick and personalized access.
SERVICES_LIST.MARKET_OVERVIEW_DETAILS: An exclusive section listing major international stock exchanges such as NYSE, NASDAQ, LSE, and others, providing users with an updated global market view.

TERMS_OF_SERVICE.USER_OBLIGATIONS_CONTENT: Users agree not to use the site for illegal or unauthorized activities. The following actions are not allowed:
USER_OBLIGATIONS_LIST: Violating local, state, national, or international laws.
Distributing viruses or any other harmful technology.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.LIMITATION_OF_LIABILITY_CONTENT: We are not responsible for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use our site. Financial data provided through Twelve Data APIs is for informational purposes only and should not be considered financial advice.
TERMS_OF_SERVICE.INTELLECTUAL_PROPERTY_CONTENT: All content on the site, including texts, graphics, logos, images, and software, is our property or licensed to us and is protected by copyright and trademark laws.
